thread.section_title: Hoselink Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hoselink | hoselink.com.au
thread.title: Kevin James

author: Kevin James
title: Kevin James
text: Arrived by post.... inboxed... only fitment required was to attach Holder to wall and then attach hose reel to holder.... screw easy fit non drip attachment on to tap and presto all was working... the kids love it... 25m of high pressure hose... reaches to most parts of garden from one tap.. will purchase another to complete rear and front yards.. gardening was never so easy... thanks hoselink
